name: Quest for Cool
description:
Quest for Cool

Have you ever wanted to relive high school? Have you ever wanted to watch someone else relive high school? If your answer to either of these are yes, then Quest for Cool is for you! Meet Hank, our lovable protagonist, as he realizes that it's his time to be cool. Work hard and think fast in this short and sweet adventure about finding yourself.

This interactive story leads you through a series of minigames about becoming what you see in those you admire. But be careful: make sure to not lose yourself in the process.

Quest for Cool is a playable experience created by Jackson Gerard, Esmeralda Rangel, and Solomon Bell.
